name: Sweet Elite
storyline:
Riches, fame, glamour and unprecedented talent: Arlington Academy truly has it all. Coming from a modest background, you've worked hard to get admitted as a scholarship student, but the pressure of being surrounded by the world's most elite teenagers threatens to ruin your ambitions. That being said, being classmates with celebrities, business moguls, star athletes and supermodels does come with a few advantages. Notably, the chance to build bonds that will last for the rest of your life. As for romance, well, you don't have time to be falling in love... but will you be able to help it?

Oh, and don't count on the adults around you to have your back. They have too many secrets to keep track of to be of any real help.

Sweet Elite is a coming of age love story about friendship, family and never giving up on yourself, no matter what. The way you play is up to you: customize your character, choose their academic department and build your relationships the way you want to.
summary:
Flirt and Uncover the Secrets of the Academy. The story and your relationships are shaped by your choices! The way you play is up to you!

Sweet Elite is an online visual novel where you play as scholarship student at Arlington Academy, a prestigious high school only accessible to the best teenagers in their respective fields worldwide.
